channel.title: Spawn atkin npc
channel.description:
how do i spawn a npc that spawns then atks the person that made it spawn
(im using the logout void 2 make it spawn, so when ur afk 4 the certain time, it spawns a npc that will attack the player)
[code] case 202: // idle logout packet - ignore for now break;[/code]
dat
wat i need help with is... 1) making it spawn 2) atking the certain person 3) only able 2 b atked by the person that spawned it 4) follow them so they cant run 5) tele to them if they try 2 tele away
rep++ 2 any help :)
